thread.section_title: The Z Hotel Piccadilly - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Absolutely perfect! 5*
thread.title_full: Absolutely perfect! 5* - Review of The Z Hotel Piccadilly, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: lexi97_x
title: Absolutely perfect! 5*
text:
First time visiting London and what an experience! The Z hotel was truly fabulous. On arrival, we had booked in early and received a complimentary upgrade to a room with a window - which was great. The room was very clean, had a large TV, toiletries and complimentary tea/coffee & water. Very impressed! Staff were very helpful and friendly. Had an issue with the shower temperature in the early hours of the morning and was quickly sorted out with in 2 minutes of reporting it.
Will be staying again! Highly recommend!
